## Overview


This tutorial takes a breather from the linear model to look at presenting data and writing up research. We look at bar graphs, histograms, box-plots and line graphs. We also take a look at the format of research reports (i.e. journal articles) and how to prepare a report (based loosely on APA format, which is a popular style convention in Psychology journals).
